text: Arthur Ewart Clair Atkinson (May 26, 1892 – September 29, 1967) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Sunbury County from 1925 to 1935. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1892 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: Ewart C. Atkinson
